64.eng-name: Military Expeditions led by the Prophet (pbuh) (Al-Maghaazi)

hadiths.text: Katade, Enes r.a.'l şöyle derken dinledim: "Nebi Sallallahu Aleyhi ve Sellem şöyle buyurdu: Uhud bizi seven, bizim" de kendisini sevdiğimiz bir dağdır

chapter.eng-name: “Uhud is a mountain that loves us and is loved by us.”
